content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I recall receiving a command to list files in the current directory. However, when the command was executed, it returned too much output and failed. I was instructed not to execute the command again with the same arguments. Later, I received a command to clone a repository with a specified URL and clone path. The previous attempt to list files returned an empty list. When the command to clone the repository was executed, it returned an error due to an invalid URL format. Recently, I received a command to search for a query on Google. The query was "<query>".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/query", "https://support.google.com/docs/answer/3093343?hl=en", "https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/reference/api/pandas.DataFrame.query.html", "https://www.techtarget.com/searchdatamanagement/definition/query", "https://www.dictionary.com/browse/query", "https://www.php.net/manual/en/pdo.query.php", "https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/query-dsl.html", "https://developers.google.com/chart/interactive/docs/querylanguage"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "python machine learning repository"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://github.com/rasbt/python-machine-learning-book-3rd-edition", "https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets.php", "https://medium.com/@thedavescience/10-github-repositories-for-learning-python-and-data-science-99297a5beafa", "https://stackoverflow.com/questions/66945361/how-to-get-the-data-from-uci-machine-learning-repository", "https://towardsdatascience.com/introducing-a-simple-and-intuitive-python-api-for-uci-machine-learning-repository-fd2ce8eb6cd4", "https://machinelearningmastery.com/a-guide-to-getting-datasets-for-machine-learning-in-python/", "https://machinelearninghd.com/iris-dataset-uci-machine-learning-repository-project/", "https://machinelearningmastery.com/machine-learning-in-python-step-by-step/"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "clone_repository", "args": {"url": "https://github.com/rasbt/python-machine-learning-book-3rd-edition.git", "clone_path": "/home/atlas/ml-repo"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command clone_repository returned: Cloned https://github.com/rasbt/python-machine-learning-book-3rd-edition.git to /home/atlas/ml-repo'}]
"""
